TITLE Beef and Sweet Potato Hash

# Preheat oven to 350F.
# Bring one quart of water to a boil in a medium sauce pan.
# Peel [1 item sweet potato] and cut into half inch pieces.
# Simmer potato until tender. Drain and mash lightly. Set aside in a bowl large enough for the remaining ingredients. 

# Mince [1⁄4 cup shallot] and [1.5 stalk celery].
# Pre-heat an oven safe well seasoned skillet. 
# Saute shallot and celery in [2 tbl butter] until tender and add to the bowl. 
# Cut [10 oz cooked prime rib] into half inch pieces and add to the bowl. 
# Finely chop [1 tbl parsley] and [1 tsp rosemary] and add to the bowl.
# Add [2.5 tbl ketchup], [1⁄2 tsp hot sauce], [salt] and [pepper] to taste.
# Stir to combine.
# Return skillet to the heat. 
# Add potato mixture to the skillet and form into a compact cake.
# Cook without moving until browned. 
# Transfer skillet to the oven and cook until the top is lighlty browned. 
# Invert onto a plate. 
# Top with [2 item eggs] fried eggs.
